articles.title: MERN Social Media App
articles.description: A simple social media application with users, posts, likes and comments - developed using React, Node, Express and MongoDB.

articles.title: Google File System Replica
articles.description: In this project I try to emulate a file system and a set of clients accessing the files. You may require the knowledge of thread and/or socket programming and its APIs of the language you choose.

articles.title: Pathfinding Visualiser
articles.description: Demonstration of how algorithms like BFS, DFS, Dijikstra, A* etc algorithms work and how efficient they are in terms of Time Complexity

articles.title: Stock Exchange Web Application
articles.description: A Stock Market Project created with 3 different servers with many features such as caching, authentication, security etc

articles.title: Multi Thread Implementation using C
articles.description: Here we have demonstrated that if we carry out the operation of multiplying two large operands using multi-threading it takes less time as compared to single threading method.
